block.p: 1.975 million 56 Crosby Street 2-bedroom, 3-bath, 3,200-sq.-ft. condo in a prewar loft building; renovated baths, marble floors, fireplace; common charge $729; taxes $18,756; listed at $1.995 million, 2 weeks on market (broker: Douglas Elliman)

1.975 million 56 Crosby Street 2-bedroom, 3-bath, 3,200-sq.-ft. condo in a prewar loft building; renovated baths, marble floors, fireplace; common charge $729; taxes $18,756; listed at $1.995 million, 2 weeks on market (broker: Douglas Elliman)

635,000 39 Fifth Avenue (10th Street) 1-bedroom, 1-bath, 850-sq.-ft. co-op in a prewar building; 24-hr. doormen, concierge, windowed kitchen, fireplace, oversize closets, Hudson River view; maintenance $1,100, 47% tax deductible; listed at $625,000 (multiple bids), 5 weeks on market (broker: Corcoran Group)

790,000 201 East 77th Street 2-bedroom, 2-bath, 1,350-sq.-ft. co-op in a postwar building; 24-hr. doormen, renovated kitchen and baths, parquet floors, central air-conditioning, 3 exposures; maintenance $1,168, 39% tax deductible; listed at $795,000, 8 weeks on market (broker: Bellmarc Realty)

460,000 515 East 89th Street 2-bedroom, 2-bath, 1,600-sq.-ft. co-op in a prewar building; 24-hr. doormen, windowed kitchen and baths, high ceilings, hardwood floors, original moldings and detail; maintenance $1,500, 44% tax deductible; listed at $460,000, 4 weeks on market (broker: Cooper Square Realty)

560,000 310 West 72nd Street 2-bedroom, 1 1/2-bath, 1,200-sq.-ft. co-op in a prewar building; 24-hr. doormen, living room, 2 exposures, Central Park view; maintenance $1,240, 58% tax deductible; listed at $569,000, 4 weeks on market (broker: Halstead Property Company)

986,000 550 Second Street 4-bedroom, 2-bath, 4-story brownstone; dining room, decorative mantels, high ceilings, hardwood floors, original plaster ceilings, 20-by-95-ft. lot; taxes $2,463; listed at $899,000 (multiple bids), 1 week on market (broker: Corcoran Group Brooklyn)

1.35 million 597 Second Street 5-bedroom, 2-bath, 3-story brownstone; dining room, eat-in kitchen, marble mantels, fireplace, stained-glass windows, finished basement, 20-by-100-ft. lot; taxes $3,325; listed at $1.4 million, 3 weeks on market (broker: Warren Lewis Realty)

852,500 380 Ninth Street 2-family, 4-story brownstone; 4 bedrooms, 3 baths, dining area, fireplace, rear deck in primary triplex; 1 bedroom, 1 bath in other; rear garden, 20-by-72-ft. lot; taxes $1,900; listed at $879,000, 3 weeks on market (broker: Joseph Berman Realty)

640,000 193-49 Keno Avenue 6-bedroom, 3 1/2-bath, 45-year-old brick and fieldstone expanded ranch; dining room, renovated eat-in kitchen and baths, den, fireplace, 2-car garage, 94-by-166-ft. lot; taxes $3,408; listed at $729,000, 4 weeks on market (broker: Goller & Costi)

565,000 5 Lindsley Drive 3-bedroom, 3-bath, 53-year-old colonial-style house; dining room, eat-in kitchen, enclosed sunroom, fireplace, 51-by-109-ft. lot on cul-de-sac; taxes $14,834; listed at $525,000 (multiple bids), 13 weeks on market (brokers: Coldwell Banker/Larchmont; Weichert Realtors)

589,000 100 Harbor Cove (Paradise Harbor) 3-bedroom, 2-bath, 1,815-sq.-ft. newly constructed town house condo; dining room, eat-in kitchen, hardwood floors, private patio, 2-car garage; clubhouse, tennis courts, pool and exercise room in complex; common charge $541; taxes $12,369; listed at $589,000, 17 weeks on market (Broker: Coldwell Banker/New City)

2.485 million 4 Elliot Lane 6-bedroom, 4-year-old colonial-style house; 4 full and 2 half baths, family room, library, 4 fireplaces, pool and spa, 3-car garage, 2-acre lot; taxes $16,541; listed at $2.649 million, 15 weeks on market (Broker: Prudential Connecticut Realty)
